basics.name: Rodhan Patke
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: An aspiring passionate biotechnologist, enthusiastic about learning new avenues in the field of Molecular Sciences and Computational Biology, with the sole aim to utilize my knowledge, skills, and abilities towards the betterment of humanity. I am expected to begin my M.Sc. in Molecular Biotechnology in the School of Biosciences at the University of Birmingham from Septermber 2021.

education.area: Molecular Biotechnology (expected to begin in September, 2021)

courses: Bioinformatics Certificate Course from the University of Mumbai

work.company: Bai Jerabai Wadia Hospital for Children, Mumbai, India
work.position: Student Intern at Molecular Genetics Research Lab
highlights: Received hands-on experience in molecular biology laboratory techniques like Allele specific-PCR, RFLP, and Agarose gel electrophoresis.
Gained knowledge of bioinformatics tools for sequence retrieval and primer designing.

work.company: Bai Jerabai Wadia Hospital for Children, Mumbai, India
work.position: Student Intern at Molecular Genetics Research Lab
highlights: Worked with bioinformatics sequence analysis and received hands-on experience in molecular biology laboratory techniques like PCR, Agarose gel electrophoresis, RFLP.

volunteer.organization: Thakur College of Science and Commerce
highlights: Audio visual movie and explanatory presentations were made for spreading awareness of Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana and Mission Indradhanush to Non-Academic staff of Thakur College of Science and Commerce.

volunteer.organization: Thakur College of Science and Commerce
highlights: Stage audio/visual management during live events

awards.title: Certificate of Merit
awards.summary: Selected for Final Round of 15th Inter-Collegiate/Institute/Department Avishkar Research Convention: 2020-21 for a research proposal titled 'Development and Validation of Bioinformatics Online Software for Taxonomical Identification of Enterobacteriaceae Species Using Biochemical Examinations'.

awards.title: First place in intra-college science exhibition - Origin 2021
awards.awarder: Thakur College of Science and Commerce
awards.summary: Secured 1st place for project entitled 'Morphological characterization of endophytic bacteria from Moringa Oleifera'.

awards.title: Third place in intra-college science exhibition - Origin 2020
awards.awarder: Thakur College of Science and Commerce
awards.summary: Secured 3rd place for project entitled 'Online database of Bacterial Identification'.

awards.title: Certificate of Participation in Avishkar Research Convention 2019-20
awards.summary: Performed and presented a wet-lab research project on 'Isolation and characterization of endophytic bacteria from Moringa oleifera'.

awards.title: Second place in intra-college science exhibition - Origin 2019
awards.awarder: Thakur College of Science and Commerce
awards.summary: Secured 2nd place for science project on 'CRISPR Technology'.
